title: SOUTH END 1 BED W/BALCONY ~NO FEE~
posting_body: ['NO FEE!', 'South End luxury apartment with easy access to tons of shops, restaurants, Whole Foods, public transportation, Tufts Medical/Dental, BMC, BU Medical/Dental, and easy access to major highways.', 'Hardwood floors on living areas with carpet in the bedrooms, modern kitchen breakfast bar, expansive windows, and in-unit laundry.', 'Rent includes trash removal, and amenities.', '*Pricing and availability are subject to change*', 'AMENITIES:', '24-hour concierge', '24-hour package pickup', 'Barbeque areas', 'Bicycle storage', 'Build credit score with RentTrack', 'Cabanas poolside', 'Conference room', 'Co-working spaces with Wi-fi', 'Deposit free with Rhino', 'Electric vehicle charging stations', 'Furnished apartments available', 'Garage parking', 'Large TV media center', 'LEED Certified Silver', 'Moving services with Move Matcher', 'Non-smoking community', 'Paws pet park', 'Pet friendly', 'Pool tables', 'Resident app', 'Resort-style pool', 'Sky Deck', 'Social lounge areas', 'Two-story fitness center', 'Yoga room', 'APPLIANCES:', '- Air Conditioning', '- Dishwasher', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Microwave', '- Range', '- Refrigerator', '- Washer and Dryer', 'Lease Length:', '- 14 Months lease (various lease terms available.', 'Price changes based on lease term.', '14 month lease best price)', 'PETS:', '- Cats Allowed - 2 max; $100/month/cat', '- Dogs Allowed - 3 max.', 'No weight limit.', 'Breed restrictions apply.', '$135/month/dog', 'PARKING:', 'Motorcycle Parking - Reserved $100/month', 'Parking Garage - Reserved $500-$625/month', 'Parking Garage - Unassigned $420/month', 'Contact me for more info or to schedule a tour asap!']
